name.ja: カラーブロック  Online Game
name.th: บล็อคสี  Puzzle Game

short.ar: Color Block هي لعبة ألغاز HTML5 حيث يقوم اللاعبون بمطابقة الكتل والقضاء عليها حسب اللون. لديها أوضاع لعب مختلفة.
short.am: Color Block ተጫዋቾች የሚዛመዱበት እና ብሎኮችን በቀለም የሚያስወግዱበት HTML5 የእንቆቅልሽ ጨዋታ ነው። የተለያዩ የጨዋታ ሁነታዎች አሉት.
short.bg: Color Block е HTML5 пъзел игра, в която играчите съпоставят и елиминират блокове по цвят. Има различни режими на игра.
short.bn: কালার ব্লক হল একটি HTML5 ধাঁধা খেলা যেখানে খেলোয়াড়রা রঙের মাধ্যমে ব্লক মেলে এবং নির্মূল করে। এতে বিভিন্ন গেম মোড রয়েছে।
short.ca: Color Block és un joc de trencaclosques HTML5 on els jugadors coincideixen i eliminen blocs per color. Té diferents modes de joc.
short.cs: Color Block je logická hra HTML5, kde hráči spojují a eliminují bloky podle barvy. Má různé herní režimy.
short.da: Color Block er et HTML5-puslespil, hvor spillere matcher og eliminerer blokke efter farve. Den har forskellige spiltilstande.
short.de: Color Block ist ein HTML5-Puzzlespiel, bei dem Spieler Blöcke nach Farbe zuordnen und eliminieren. Es hat verschiedene Spielmodi.

short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,no,pt_BR,: Color Block is an HTML5 puzzle game where players match and eliminate blocks by color. It has various game modes.

short.fa: Color Block یک بازی پازل HTML5 است که در آن بازیکنان بلوک ها را با رنگ مطابقت داده و حذف می کنند. حالت های مختلف بازی دارد.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Color Block is an HTML5 puzzle game where players match and eliminate blocks by color. It has various game modes.
Color Block is an exciting and challenging HTML5 game that tests players' coordination and strategic thinking skills. In the game, players present with a grid of colored blocks. Must arrange them so that blocks of the same color touch each other. When a group of blocks of the same color is handled, they will disappear. And the blocks above them will fall, filling the space.
The game's objective is to create as many groups of blocks. As possible before the unions reach the top of the screen. As players progress through the game, the speed at which the blocks fall increases, making it more challenging to keep up. To stay ahead, players must think quickly and plan their moves carefully.
One of the critical features of Color Block is its intuitive and easy-to-use controls. Players can move the blocks around the grid by dragging and dropping them with their mouse or finger. This allows for fast and fluid gameplay that is easy to pick up and play.
In addition to the standard game mode, Color Block also includes a variety of challenging levels and game modes to keep players coming back for more. In the Puzzle mode, players must use their strategic thinking skills to solve increasingly tricky levels. Endlessly, players must try to stay alive for as long as possible, creating groups of blocks as quickly as possible to keep the blocks from reaching the top of the screen.
Overall, Color Block is a fun and addictive HTML5 game that keeps players entertained for hours. Its challenging gameplay, various game modes, and easy-to-use controls make it a must-play for anyone looking for a brain-teasing and engaging game.
